subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Keith Yandle scored his first goal for the Rangers since being acquired from Arizona on March 1, and Mackenzie Skapski made 2o saves for his first career N.H.L. shutout.
snippet: Keith Yandle scored his first goal for the Rangers since being acquired from Arizona on March 1, and Mackenzie Skapski made 2o saves for his first career N.H.L. shutout.
